quote: Passwords are like underwear: you don’t let people see it, you should change it very often, and you shouldn’t share it with strangers.
author: — Chris Prillo

quote: Security used to be an inconvenience sometimes, but now it’s a necessity all the time.
author: — Martina Navratilova

quote: I think computer viruses should count as life. I think it says something about human nature that the only form of life we have created so far is purely destructive. We’ve created life in our own image.
author: — Stephen Hawking

quote: Privacy – like eating and breathing – is one of life’s basic requirements.
author: — Katherine Neville

quote: At the end of the day, the goals are simple: safety and security.
author: — Jodi Rell

quote: When you say, ‘I have nothing to hide,’ you’re saying, ‘I don’t care about this right
author: — Edward Snowden

quote: Cyber-Security is much more than a matter of IT.
author: — Stephane Nappo

quote: If you spend more on coffee than on IT security, you will be hacked. What’s more, you deserve to be hacked.
author: — Richard Clarke

quote: Security in IT is like locking your house or car – it doesn’t stop the bad guys, but if it’s good enough they may move on to an easier target.
author: — Paul Herbka
